ffb package¶

Submodules¶

ffb.custom_thread module¶

Customised threading class to terminate under Windows.

class ffb.custom_thread.ShutdownCompliantThread(shutdown_request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: threading.Thread

run()¶

Method representing the thread’s activity.

You may override this method in a subclass. The standard run() method invokes the callable object passed to the object’s constructor as the target argument, if any, with sequential and keyword arguments taken from the args and kwargs arguments, respectively.

ffb.errors module¶

exception ffb.errors.ConfigurationParametersNotLoadedError¶

Bases: Exception

Indicate error if configuration is not found or loaded incomplete.

ffb.interface module¶

Interface to Brunner CLS-E force feedback joystick.

class ffb.interface.Interface(receiver_thread_active: bool = False, force: Optional[numpy.ndarray] = None, state: Optional[numpy.ndarray] = None, config_name: str = 'default', config_path: Optional[str] = None, config: Optional[dict] = None, host: Optional[str] = None, port: Optional[int] = None, buffer_size: Optional[int] = None, timeout: Optional[float] = None, socket: Optional[socket.socket] = None, external_force_max: Optional[float] = None, autopilot_activated: bool = True, autopilot_force: Optional[float] = None, autopilot_speed: Optional[float] = None, exponential_scale: Optional[float] = None, exponential_threshold: Optional[float] = None, actuation_idle_detected: bool = False, frequency_desired_actuation: Optional[float] = None, frequency_minimum_actuation: Optional[float] = None, timeperiod_next_actuation: Optional[float] = None, time_period_next_actuation_maximum: Optional[float] = None, stamp_axes_state: Optional[float] = None, stamp_last_actuation: Optional[float] = None, debug_is_enabled: bool = False, has_new_message: bool = False, statistics: Optional[dict] = None)¶

Bases: object

activate_autopilot()¶

Activate autopilot for x and y axis based interaction.

actuate(x, y, now=False)¶

Actuate external force command to joystick.

Note:

Expects (x,y) applied in ENU coordinate frame according to REP105 and converts it internally to corresponding aileron and elevator.

actuate_safe(safe=True, *args, **kwargs)¶

Safe actuation for test setups to confirm single actuation.

actuate_test(t, stop=False)¶

Time varying force actuation reference script.

actuation_stream_is_active()¶

Returns true if actuation is active.

Note:

Once detection happens variables for transitioning are initialised.

connect()¶

Connect to CLS2SIM interface.

deactivate_autopilot()¶

Deactivate autopilot on both axes.

enable_autopilot(enable: bool)¶
enable_override(axis: ffb.protocol.Axis, command_type)¶
exit()¶

Process exit request to end interface gracefully.

get_axes_xy(mark_fetched=True)¶

Return 2 dimensional vector for xy axis measurement.

get_axes_xy_processed()¶

Return exponential post processed xy axis measurement.

get_position()¶

Return joystick position in 2 dimensional vector in ENU frame.

initialise_autopilot()¶

Activate autopilot for x and y axis based interaction.

property is_active¶
launch_receiver_thread()¶

Launch a non-blocking receiver thread fetching data.

read_data(axis: ffb.protocol.Axis, command_type)¶
receive()¶

Return a single axes state measurement.

reset_statistics()¶

Reset the interface statistics.

send_command(command: ffb.protocol.CommandDefinition, command_type: ffb.protocol.CommandType, axis: Optional[ffb.protocol.Axis] = None, profile=None, value=None)¶

Return raw response data for specified command type.

set_autopilot_force(axis: ffb.protocol.Axis, force: float)¶

Set autopilot force for axis.

set_position(x=0, y=0)¶

Set setpoint for autopilot to xy position.

update_setting(axis: ffb.protocol.Axis, command_type: ffb.protocol.CommandType, value)¶

ffb.protocol module¶

Module containing command, axis and message protocol definitions.

class ffb.protocol.Axis(value)¶

Bases: enum.IntEnum

Selecting X as elevator and y as aileron yields REP103 body frame.

X = 1¶
Y = 2¶
